dict.acceptation: 到达，抵达；出现，登场；新生婴儿；到达者；

sent.orig: Checks daily Arrival List Special Arrival List for VIPs, repeat guests and FITs.
sent.trans: 检查每日预抵客人表、重要客人、回头客和散客的预抵表。

sent.orig: Checks the daily Arrival List, Special Arrival List for VIPs, repeat guests and FITs.
sent.trans: 检查逐日预抵客人表、重要客人、回头客和散客的预抵表。

sent.orig: The time of arrival or the arrival time is indicated on the screen.
sent.trans: 屏幕上显示出到达时间。

sent.orig: Latest arrival of relevant documents at our office must be 7days before cargo arrival destination port.
sent.trans: 有关文件最晚于货物到达目的港7天前送达我公司。

sent.orig: Few events arouse more teenage angst than the springtime arrival of college rejection letters.
sent.trans: 没有什么比春季收到大学拒绝信更让十几岁的年轻人感到恐惧了。
